p: Blood samples were taken from cattle at nine different farms distributed in six major regions of HLJ, including Qiqihar (QQHR), Daqing (DQ), Suihua (SH), Harbin (HRB), Mudanjiang (MDJ), and Jixi (JX) (Fig. 1b). As listed in Table 1, a total of 730 samples were collected and examined. Each blood sample was used for subsequent DNA extraction. Genomic DNA was extracted from 200 μL aliquots using the Qiagen DNA extraction kit (QIAamp DNA Mini Kit, Hilden, Germany) following the manufacturer’s protocol and subjected to downstream nested PCR assay.
